description: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows giving coefficients in expansion of n! * Sum_{i=0..n} C(x,i) in descending powers of x.
comments: Apparently A190782 with reversed rows. - _Mathew Englander_, May 17 2014
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n = 0..100 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: c[n_, k_] := Product[n-i, {i, 0, k-1}]/k!; row[n_] := CoefficientList[ n!*Sum[c[x, k], {k, 0, n}], x] // Reverse; Table[ row[n], {n, 0, 9}] // Flatten  (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 04 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 17 2000
extensions: Missing 0 corrected by Steve Marak - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 27 2012
